verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329>, Altaschith <WH516>, Michtam <WH4387> of David <WH1732>. Do ye indeed <WH552> speak <WH1696> righteousness <WH6664>, O congregation <WH482>? do ye judge <WH8199> uprightly <WH4339>, O ye sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>? Altaschith: or, Destroy not, A golden Psalm of David
Yea, in heart <WH3820> ye work <WH6466> wickedness <WH5766>; ye weigh <WH6424> the violence <WH2555> of your hands <WH3027> in the earth <WH776>.
The wicked <WH7563> are estranged <WH2114> from the womb <WH7358>: they go astray <WH8582> as soon as they be born <WH990>, speaking <WH1696> lies <WH3577>. as soon: Heb. from the belly

Their poison <WH2534> is like <WH1823> the poison <WH2534> of a serpent <WH5175>: they are like the deaf <WH2795> adder <WH6620> that stoppeth <WH331> her ear <WH241>; like the poison: Heb. according to the likeness, etc adder: or, asp
Which will not hearken <WH8085> to the voice <WH6963> of charmers <WH3907>, charming <WH2266> <WH2267> never so wisely <WH2449>. charming: or, be the charmer never so cunning
Break <WH2040> their teeth <WH8127>, O God <WH430>, in their mouth <WH6310>: break out <WH5422> the great teeth <WH4459> of the young lions <WH3715>, O LORD <WH3068>.
Let them melt away <WH3988> as waters <WH4325> which run continually <WH1980>: when he bendeth <WH1869> his bow to shoot his arrows <WH2671>, let them be as cut in pieces <WH4135>.
As a snail <WH7642> which melteth <WH8557>, let every one of them pass away <WH1980>: like the untimely birth <WH5309> of a woman <WH802>, that they may not see <WH2372> the sun <WH8121>.
Before your pots <WH5518> can feel <WH995> the thorns <WH329>, he shall take them away as with a whirlwind <WH8175>, both living <WH2416>, and in his wrath <WH2740>. both: Heb. as living as wrath
The righteous <WH6662> shall rejoice <WH8055> when he seeth <WH2372> the vengeance <WH5359>: he shall wash <WH7364> his feet <WH6471> in the blood <WH1818> of the wicked <WH7563>.

So that a man <WH120> shall say <WH559>, Verily there is a reward <WH6529> for the righteous <WH6662>: verily he is <WH3426> a God <WH430> that judgeth <WH8199> in the earth <WH776>. a reward: Heb. fruit of the, etc
